snippet: “Iron Man 3” is said to have taken in almost $21 million on its first day of release in China.
abstract: Movie Iron Man 3 is reported to have taken in almost $21 million on its first day of release in China, reasserting Hollywood as country's major entertainment provider.
lead_paragraph: “Iron Man 3” is said to have taken in almost $21 million on its first day of release in China.

headline.main: Big Opening for ‘Iron Man 3’ in China
headline.print_headline:
A Victory for Hollywood
With ‘Iron Man 3’ in China
